The claim made by Republican lawmakers t: lets every American keep more of what they earned" was reiterated by House Republican leader McCarthy during the official unveiling of the bill.
The Joint Committee on Taxation: a nonpartisan arbiter of tax bills, analyzed the bill and confirmed that, on average, every income range would see a tax cut.
However: the committee's analysis also revealed that not every American would see a tax cut, as some individuals may experience an increase in taxes due to changes in deductions.
The analysis further projected that by 2: the tax cuts would disappear for groups with modest incomes, with taxes rising for certain income ranges.
